title: Professional Scrum Development with Microsoft Visual Studio 2012
description:
Book Description

Discover how to turn requirements into working software incrementsÃ¢â‚¬â€faster and more efficientlyÃ¢â‚¬â€using Visual Studio 2012 in combination with Scrum and Agile engineering practices. Team members will learn proven practices and techniques for implementing Scrum to manage an applicationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life cycle, as well as seamlessly plan, manage, and track their Scrum projects.
